ud3.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud3.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahakassapo pippaliguhayam viharati, sattaham ekapallankena nisinno hoti annataram samadhim samapajjitva.
ud3.7:1.4: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo tassa sattahassa accayena tamha samadhimha vutthasi.
ud3.7:1.5: Atha kho ayasmato mahakassapassa tamha samadhimha vutthitassa etadahosi:
ud3.7:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena pancamattani devatasatani ussukkam apannani honti ayasmato mahakassapassa pindapatapatilabhaya.
ud3.7:2.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo tani pancamattani devatasatani patikkhipitva pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
ud3.7:2.3: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devanamindo ayasmato mahakassapassa pindapatam datukamo hoti.
ud3.7:3.2: Pesakaravannam abhinimminitva tantam vinati. Suja asurakanna tasaram pureti.
ud3.7:3.3: Atha kho ayasma mahakassapo rajagahe sapadanam pindaya caramano yena sakkassa devanamindassa nivesanam tenupasankami.
ud3.7:3.4: Addasa kho sakko devanamindo ayasmantam mahakassapam duratova agacchantam.
ud3.7:3.5: Disvana ghara nikkhamitva paccuggantva hatthato pattam gahetva gharam pavisitva ghatiya odanam uddharitva pattam puretva ayasmato mahakassapassa adasi.
ud3.7:3.6: So ahosi pindapato anekasupo anekabyanjano anekarasabyanjano.
ud3.7:3.8: “ko nu kho ayam satto yassayam evarupo iddhanubhavo”ti?
ud3.7:4.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo ayasmantam mahakassapam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
ud3.7:4.5: Assosi kho bhagava dibbaya sotadhatuya visuddhaya atikkantamanusikaya sakkassa devanamindassa vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe tikkhattum udanam udanentassa:
ud3.7:5.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
